      • lookTowards

        public void lookTowards(double x,
                        double y,
                        double z)
        Tries to look along the normal value provided. As in the normal provided would be pointed towards the user after this function has been called. The x,y,z components will be normalized before calculating.
        Parameters:
        x - component of normal
        y -
        z -

      • lookTowards

        public void lookTowards(double[] normal,
                        double[] up)
        Tries to look along the normal value provided, with the up axis used for up.
        Parameters:
        normal - normalized vector that to be looked along.
        up - vector that will nearly 'up' when looking along.
